Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. I just made a craft capable of getting to duna. (haven't gotten back yet). But I haven't tried for eve though. Also my first flight would have been better but the 6 big boosters stuck on so the 1 large engine had to move much more. Tell me what you guys can do with it.

Edited September 22, 2012 by NannerManCan
Interesting. Could you uploade some screenshots of the craft so the people that don't want to downlaod the .craft file can give their evaluation too?
How do I take a screenshot again?

by hitting F1

and that rocket is MASSIVE, but the nuclear engines are a bit to under powered, i am going to modify it and try to EVE
Sorry the forums are laggy but the interplanetary duna craft has a fix for the tanks because they weren't on the decouplers before

yeah i have been dealling with the lagg to but the nuclear engines aren't working that well for the ship you might want to add more, or use differant ones, also has some controlability problems in the first few stages
lags a bit but looks like a quality ship
The nuclear engines work fine. They aren't supposed to be powerful btw but there very efficeint
